summary: This mod allows you to harvest one Human Heart, one sample of Human Flesh, one Skull, and one sample of Bone Meal from any human killed, because they weren\'t as accessable as they should have been.
descriptionHtml:
Version 1.1

This mod allows you to harvest one Human Heart, one sample of Human Flesh, one Skull, and one sample of Bone Meal from any human killed, because they weren\'t as accessable as they should have been.

===Version 1.1===
-Fixed a bug that caused warlocks to potentially drop more than one of each part.

Okay, I\'ve never uploaded anything to the Nexus before, so I\'m not quite sure how it works. I just slapped the .esp in a .rar and uploaded it, I hope it works.
author: Rokenian
